item.title: Report X-2024060346
item.description:
Report X-2024060346

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-06
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg repacked at origin facility and not marked properly. No Damage Pkg Report or Hazmat Report filed. Four x 1 qt. bottles not repacked. Loose caps allowed liquid to leak wetting and contaminating the contents and carton causing the carton to rip and contents to fall out.
